description:
Video Game Night at LUX! (666 South Ave.)

**Video Games** Multiple stations will be set up with classic video game systems with Mario Kart, Sonic, Mortal Kombat, NBA Hang Time, WWE, Sega Genesis with over 100 preloaded games and much more** THE VIDEO GAMES ARE FREE TO PLAY**

**Trivia** Test your video game knoweledge and challenge your friends** Grand prizes to be given to the winners of Trivia ($25 bar tab for 1st place and special Glitch giveaway for runner up)**

**Live Music** Glitch has played several comicons around New York in is happy to be a local Rochester band. Music ranges from Zelda, Mortal Kombat, Mario, Streets of Rage, Donkey Kong, Sonic the Hedgehog....the list could go on..and on.**

**Drink Specials!**

5.00 Cover!
name: VIdeo Game Night at LUX! (Trivia! Music! Video Games!)
